channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Hunt for the gunman who killed UnitedHealthcareâ€™s CEO heads into third day as new clues emerge
item.description: As the investigation into a masked gunman who stalked and killed the head of one of the largest U.S. health insurers moves into its third day, possible leads have emerged about his travel before the shooting and a message scrawled on ammunition.

item.title: Slaying of UnitedHealthcare CEO spotlights complex challenge companies face in protecting top brass
Words on ammo in CEO shooting echo common phrase on insurer tactics: Delay, deny, defend
